snippet.title: No Place for Bravery - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
No Place For Bravery, a top-down action-RPG that explores the lengths a parent would go to find their child in a war-torn world. www.noplaceforbravery.com
Wishlist us on Steam: https://bit.ly/3t1JS3f

Check the latest news: https://bit.ly/npfb-newsletter

Wanna chat about No Place for Bravery? 
Throw us a follow on Twitter @GlitchFTY and @YsbrydGames
-and-
Join our Discord Servers here:
Glitch Factory: https://discord.gg/qFkfFhH
Ysbryd Games: https://discord.gg/YsbrydGames

Music written and produced by Eduardo Zolhof
Vocals by Nils Edström (Hindarfjäll)
